Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

does anybody here play planetside2?

I started recently and I really like it.

normally I play with friends over skype or we met for lan partys.

But as this game is BIG im looking for more people I can play with so we can do organised attacks and stuff.

Ingame:

Name: JebediahxKerman

Server: Cobalt (EU)

Faction: New Conglomerate (NC)

Greetings,

LUCKYMCNEID

Edited May 26, 2013 by LUCKYMCNEID

For organized attacks use squads.

yes, but Id like to know the people a little (what vehicles they like, what class they play). Another thing is: We all here are part of the KSP community, which is great and it even gives us another topic to discuss in a "KSP Planetsidegroup"

*edit*

also: At the moment, me and my friends have each have something specific they upgrade. (for example 1of us purely upgrades the Sunderer and his engineer class so we always have a good and useful way to transport ourselfs to different places and repair our tanks.)

*/edit*

Edited May 26, 2013 by LUCKYMCNEID
Forgot Something
The Crown... I was there.... *shudders and downs another glass of hard liquor*

Hey there, the name's Youngblood. I'm an engineer with the Terran Republic on Waterson.

The Crown... I was there.... *shudders and downs another glass of hard liquor*

So many tanks... Reavers screaming overhead... Light Infantry falling from the skies, picked off by Vanu snipers too far away to see... *falls silent and stares at glass*
*finishes her drink* All that saved us was blind luck at a well timed Galaxy....
i played it a bit tad too much for my computer too horrible fps
I managed with some friends to cut off about 90% of the vanu from there warp gate (not with out the red team help).So we really screwed them on Indar (If im correct.)
I played it during beta and then a bit after release. Has the game changed much since then?

sweet! what server are you on?

US West is the server

I've been trying to play it again, but it just eats too many resources, so I'm trying to upgrade my computer in general.

Already got a capable card, just need disc space and RAM.

But I'd try to play with ya. ;D

I've been trying to play it again, but it just eats too many resources, so I'm trying to upgrade my computer in general.

Already got a capable card, just need disc space and RAM.

But I'd try to play with ya. ;D

Run it on the lowest settings, works for me.

I played it during beta and then a bit after release. Has the game changed much since then?

as far as I know there have been some pretty major balance updates. Im not sure what all has changed sinced you played but: theres a new land vehicle, the harasser (3people: 1driver, 1gunner and 1seat on the back with no extras). Another thing is that the power of generall AA-guns has increased quite a bit so its kinda tricky too fly around in aeroplanes. Im sure theres some more Information (patchnotes or something) on the planetside2 website somewhere.

US West is the server

as said in the post I, are in Europe :/

Run it on the lowest settings, works for me.

I do, and it STILL gives me problems. x3

I've been trying to play it again, but it just eats too many resources, so I'm trying to upgrade my computer in general.

Already got a capable card, just need disc space and RAM.

But I'd try to play with ya. ;D

Would you be ok with making a "charakter" on our server? (cobalt)

Depending on where you are you might wanna check youre ping (if youre not europe).

If its fine, you can send me a Friend request! (Name: JebediahxKerman )
